div.script: var photoGallery2512= {"Album": {"title":"1280px w by 500px h Homepage Photos","description":"","transitiondelay":"3","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"1280","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/NY19000452/Centricity/ModuleInstance/3106/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/NY19000452/Centricity/ModuleInstance/3106/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/NY19000452/Centricity/ModuleInstance/3106/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"Help Wanted","src":"nurse.png?rnd=0.187857584649631","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Getting it done!","src":"bigmachines.png?rnd=0.662013366195379","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Scoop!","src":"scoop.png?rnd=0.351688885759417","caption":"Despite our school closure, our essential construction projects continue.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Nothing stops our learning.","src":"buischhelg.png?rnd=0.490203038086278","caption":"Mrs. Helgeland and Mrs. Buisch prepare resources for student pick-up. ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"We're on it!","src":"corona2.png?rnd=0.0916948067451337","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"The BEST lunch ladies in the world.","src":"best2.png?rnd=0.71262795930385","caption":"Cafeteria staff prepare meals for distribution.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Prepped.","src":"banana.png?rnd=0.331605864377509","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Bus Drill Day","src":"busdrill3.png?rnd=0.151713281474874","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Read Across America","src":"readingfixfri.png?rnd=0.840436879005487","caption":"The school library celebrated Read Across America week by hosting Drop Everything and Read sessions. Students got comfy and read all types of text: fiction, informational, graphic novels and technical writing. It's all good if you're reading!","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Students always get your goat!","src":"goat.png?rnd=0.939310424467228","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"February Athlete of the Month ","src":"devonfix.jpg?rnd=0.206195966436619","caption":"Congratulations to Devin Stowe, our Wegmans AOM for February. Devin has been referred to as 'the engine of our (Boys' Basketball) team' by his coach. Full steam ahead, Devin!","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"We'll Call You.","src":"skypearonson.jpg?rnd=0.0817637243688869","caption":"Avoca 5th graders skyped with author Sarah Aronson to celebrate World Read Aloud Day. Aronson read her book, Just Like Rube Goldberg, to the class.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Message for a Marine","src":"vcardcrop.png?rnd=0.461627041204659","caption":"104 year old US Marine Major Bill White will be receiving Valentines from Mr. Meyer's 8th grade Social Studies Class this year. The class is participating in Operation Valentine to honor the WW2 veteran.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Skate, rattle and roll.","src":"skaters.JPG?rnd=0.338613419485564","caption":"Friends take a rest during a recent after school roller skating activity.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Warm and Fuzzy ","src":"blankets.png?rnd=0.844461284971079","caption":"Mrs. Kilbourne's 5th grade enrichment group made 8 fleece blankets to be donated for the Global Read Aloud Service Project. Thank you to Student Council for funding the materials needed.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Drop Everything and Read.","src":"abigil2.png?rnd=0.925940304028774","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Winning Robotics Team","src":"robot1280 720.png?rnd=0.250059186131721","caption":"The Tigers' Robotic Club won the recent GST Boces Robotics Competition. Congratulations to all student members and Advisor Mrs. Becky Fervan.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Holiday '19 Tourney Champions!","src":"holidaytourneypict.png?rnd=0.170288923275792","caption":"The Prattsburgh-Avoca Varsity Girls' Basketball Team ","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Girls Soccer","src":"biggergirlssoccer.jpg?rnd=0.396009673083206","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Prepping for the new year.","src":"readers-cropped.jpg?rnd=0.834355621521527","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Avoca Seniors","src":"seniors.jpg?rnd=0.681952143871203","caption":"","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}

img.alt: NOTICE: New York state school budget votes and board of education elections will be delayed until at least June 1, 2020, according to an executive order released by Governor Andrew Cuomo on Monday, March 30, 2020.

li.a: Do You Suspect Abuse or Maltreatment? Report it Now! Call our Statewide Toll Free Telephone Number: 1-800-342-3720

div.h1: Avoca CSD Mobile App is here!

div.strong: Click the appropriate icon below to get the new app!

p.span: No student shall be subjected to harassment by employees or students on school property or at a school function; nor shall any student be subjected to discrimination based on a person's actual or perceived race, color, weight, national origin, ethnic group, religion, religious practice, disability, sexual orientation, gender or sex by school employees or students on school property or at a school function.

div.span: The Dignity Act's underlying premise is that preventive and non-punitive intervention, in response to incidents of discrimination and /or harassment, is the best way to achieve school environments free from harassment and discrimination.
Mrs. Stephanie Helgeland, Dignity Act Coordinator

span.div: Mission StatementThe mission of Avoca Central School is to develop every child as a respectful, responsible person who is motivated and prepared academically, as well as socially, emotionally, and physically, to meet life's challenges. We will accomplish this mission by providing a coordinated curriculum implemented by a creative, collaborative staff in a supportive environment.

PO Box G, Avoca, NY 14809
